on reading compounds: 宝飾【ホウショク】jewels and ornaments, jewelry, jewellery
宝庫【ホウコ】treasury, treasure house, storehouse, repository
人間国宝【ニンゲンコクホウ】living national treasure
至宝【シホウ】greatest treasure, most valuable asset, pride (of)
kun reading compounds: 宝くじ【たからくじ】lottery, lottery ticket
お宝【おたから】treasure, picture of a treasure ship, money, cash
正直は一生の宝【しょうじきはいっしょうのたから】honesty is the best policy
